about_the_game:
When the event of Trinity is near, the restless spirits of Aphes Paragons become disturbed and the rifts to Phantasma open across the whole city. Hilda must rise up to the challenge and prove to be the Heroine that determines the fate of Aphes.

Key Features

  • New area to explore: Phantasma, an inter-dimension that holds the power of the ascended. Progress up to the event of Laurel Craft in the main campaign in order to unlock access to Phantasma. Enter the 7 trials of Phantasma by interacting with the 7 Statues of Gryphon around Aphes.
  • 7 new boss encounters: The Paragons of Aphes, legendary heroes of the past.
  • Weapon Mod System: Retrieve the "Essence of the Paragons" from Phantasma and take it to Vulcane to craft 12 new weapons exerting the power of the gods.
  • New outfit: Paragon Armor. Unlocks instantly upon acquiring the DLC.
  • Expansion of the epic stories of the myth of Aphes.
detailed_description:
How to get access to DLC content

Progress up to the event of Laurel Craft in the main campaign in order to unlock access to Phantasma. Enter the 7 trials of Phantasma by interacting with the 7 Statues of Gryphon around Aphes.

SPOILER WARNING!

Below you can find a list of locations where the Gryphon Statues can be found:

Black Streets: The trials statue in Black Streets can be found inside the building next to the Saintess.

Arges Bazaar: The trials statue in Arges Bazaar can be found inside the building with the refugees after having received the Ice Enchantite from the Priest of the Three.

Phalan Academy: The trials statue at Phalan Academy is inside the guarded building in the area where you first met Otto.

Sunken Outskirts: The trails statue in Sunken Outskirts can be found inside the building where one of the maiden keys is found, just outside of the hunters' camp.

Arges Plaza: The trials statue in Arges plaza can be found inside the building close to Prima Boulevard, right after you pass the armored bull.

Glittering Deeps: The trials shrine in Glittering Deeps can be found in the building located in the Underground Lake.

Caelum Summit: The trials shrine in Caelum Summit can be found underground, in the building in the Disc of Smite area.
